Package org.openpnp.machine.reference.solutions

Class GcodeDriverSolutions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openpnp.machine.reference.solutions.GcodeDriverSolutions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Solutions.Subject
    public class GcodeDriverSolutions
extends java.lang.Object
implements Solutions.Subject
    This helper class implements the Issues & Solutions for the GcodeDriver and GcodeAsyncDriver. The idea is not to pollute the driver implementations themselves.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void convertToAsync​(GcodeDriver gcodeDriver)
      Convert an existing GcodeDriver to a GcodeAsyncDriver while keeping all settings and Axis/Actuator assignments.
      static void convertToGcode​(NullDriver nullDriver)
      Convert an existing NullDriver to a GcodeDriver while keeping the Id and Axis/Actuator assignments.
      static void convertToPlain​(GcodeAsyncDriver asyncDriver)
      Convert an existing GcodeAsyncDriver to a GcodeDriver while keeping all settings and Axis/Actuator assignments.

      Report any detected issue and proposed solution in the list.
      static void replaceDriver​(Driver driver)
      Replace a driver with the same Id at the same place in the machine driver list.
      static void suggestGcodeCommand​(GcodeDriver gcodeDriver, HeadMountable headMountable, Solutions solutions, GcodeDriver.CommandType commandType, java.lang.String suggestedCommand, boolean commandModified, boolean disallowHeadMountables, java.lang.String rationale)
      Add a solution for the given gcodeDriver to the issues, to suggest the given suggestedCommand instead of the currentCommand.

      • suggestGcodeCommand

        public static void suggestGcodeCommand​(GcodeDriver gcodeDriver,
                                       HeadMountable headMountable,
                                       Solutions solutions,
                                       GcodeDriver.CommandType commandType,
                                       java.lang.String suggestedCommand,
                                       boolean commandModified,
                                       boolean disallowHeadMountables,
                                       java.lang.String rationale)
        Add a solution for the given gcodeDriver to the issues, to suggest the given suggestedCommand instead of the currentCommand.
        Parameters:
        gcodeDriver -
        headMountable -
        solutions -
        commandType -
        suggestedCommand -
        commandModified -
        disallowHeadMountables - Set true to disallow the commandType on HeadMountables. This is used when switching to axis letter variables.

        public static void convertToPlain​(GcodeAsyncDriver asyncDriver)
